DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect information medical record see effect proton beam radiation pituitary tumor analyze possible side effect .
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection obtain patient 's medical record include initial evaluation , pathology report , dosimetry information , radiotherapy completion record follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Histologically proven pituitary adenoma . Age 18 year old . Status post biopsy , gross total resection ( initial surgery recurrent disease ) subtotal resection . Good moderate neurological function status *Previous radiation would compromise ability deliver prescribe treatment .
